mapper.select: SELECT user_seq as userSeq, email, id, passwd, name, regist_no as registNo, signup_date as signupDate, country_sp as countrySP, nationality, birth_date as birthDate, gender, contact, ROAD_ADDRESS as roadAddress, JIBUN_ADDRESS as jibunAddress, status FROM member where user_seq = #{user_seq}
SELECT user_seq as userSeq FROM member where id = #{id}
select * from member where id = #{id} and passwd = #{passwd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (user_seq, email, id, passwd, name, regist_no, country_sp, nationality, birth_date, gender, contact, road_address, jibun_address, status) VALUES (MEMBER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{email}, #{id}, #{passwd}, #{name}, #{registNo}, #{countrySP}, #{nationality}, #{birthDate}, #{gender}, #{contact}, #{roadAddress}, #{jibunAddress}, #{status})
